tasks.description: Developed new features for web applications, using technologies like JavaScript, MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js, GraphQL, etc. While working in a team to implement efficient solutions.
Contributed to the optimization and maintenance of existing code, fixing bugs and improving application performance for a better user experience.
Worked in an agile development environment, collaborating with designers and other developers, and participating in daily stand-ups and code reviews to ensure product quality.
Coordinated the operations of the CAM team, ensuring the quality of dental parts through constant inspections and technical protocols.
Performed preventive and corrective maintenance on industrial machinery and computer systems, resolving technical failures in record time and ensuring good operational availability.
Train new employees using the best possible practices, guiding them every step of the way and striving to make their learning experience as positive as possible.
